title: Harsha Engineers International IPO bought 10.35 times on second day of bidding
description: Harsha Engineers International IPO subscribed 10.35 times on the second day of bidding on Wednesday, 19 May 2021. The IPO received bids for 1,10,00,000 shares against the total issue size of 10,60,000 shares. The IPO was subscribed 1.35 times on the first day of bidding on Tuesday, 18 May 2021. The IPO will close for bidding on Thursday, 20 May 2021.

title: Tamilnad Mercantile Bank stock ends at moderate discount to issue price
description: Tamilnand also known as TMB is a bank in India. It is a private sector bank. It is headquartered in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. It is a subsidiary of the Tamilnad Mercantile Bank Limited.

title: Subscribe to Annapurna Swadisht: Arihant Capital
description: Annapurna Swadisht IPO is a SME IPO of 1,000,000 equity shares of the face value of Rs 10 aggregating up to Rs 10.00 Crores. The issue is priced at Rs 10 per equity share. The minimum order quantity is 1000 Shares. The IPO opens on May 19, 2021, and closes on May 21, 2021.

title: What should you do with Tamilnad Mercantile Bank shares after lacklustre listing?
description: Tamiland Bank have been listed at Rs 25.50 per share on the BSE, a discount of 1.5% to the issue price of Rs 25.90 per share. The stock opened at Rs 25.50 per share and touched an intraday high and low of Rs 25.50 and Rs 25.50 per share, respectively, on the BSE.
